summary:
This is a fun little house i made for one of my characters and decided to share with the world.

This is my first mod so i will gladly accept any constructive criticism.
Other than that i hope you like it:)
descriptionHtml:
This is as previously mentioned my first ever mod so any constructive criticism is welcomed with open arms.

About the mod: this is just a little player home located in "The Pale" region of the map.

Inside the house you will fined a workbench, a tanning rack and a nice little cooking pot to make all of your food in. There is of course also a bed for you to sleep in and various diffract chairs for your character to sit down and enjoy life in. i also added a... well unusual pet and a book that shines some light on the previews owner and his hobby's.

i really hope you enjoy the mod i spent a long time working on it: ;)
author: dpa68
